import React from'react';import{PieChart,Pie,Cell,Tooltip,Legend}from"recharts";// [positive, neutral, negative]
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var COLORS=["#ccff90","#82b1ff","#ff8a80"];var PieChartComp=function PieChartComp(props){var data=props.data;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{margin:"20px 20px 0px 20px"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(PieChart,{width:400,height:360,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pie,{data:data,cx:"50%",cy:"50%",innerRadius:100,outerRadius:120,fill:"#8884d8",paddingAngle:5,dataKey:"value",children:data.map(function(entry,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Cell,{fill:COLORS[index%COLORS.length]},"cell-".concat(index));})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Legend,{verticalAlign:"bottom",height:36}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{contentStyle:{backgroundColor:'#ECF0F1',border:'none',borderRadius:5},cursor:{stroke:'red',strokeWidth:2}})]})});};export default PieChartComp;
